name: Light Up (Firrow)
description: Game made in 2021 during my training in DU Level Design at Gamagora with Lucas SPITZ-DREVET, a classmate. The game is made in C# with Unity.  For my part, I realized all the drawings, the screens and the interface. I also modified the player's movement system initially created to use the New Input System and to add the different sounds and musics of the game, which I sometimes remixed.  I hope you'll like the game and don't hesitate to visit the credits to get our contact information!
